alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 8:18AM CDT until March 29 at 7:17PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Arnold. Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River at Fenton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River at Pacific. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Route N begins to flood. At 17.0 feet, State Highway AK begins flooding near the intersection with State Highway O near this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 17.7 feet and falling. - Recent Activity...The river crested at 20.3 feet Monday afternoon. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 2.6 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Wed Thu Fri Sat Sun Meramec River Pacific 15.0 17.7 9.2 4.8 4.0 3.7 3.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
